name: President Vs Militant - Clash of Commando War Game
name_original: President Vs Militant - Clash of Commando War Game
description:
President Vs Militants is an action packed game that combines immersive 3D environments with intense FPS gameplay.

Features:
>40 levels on 10 different locations.
>Buy, sell and upgrade guns like Revolver,Rifles, light Machine Gun, Heavy Machine Gun, Sniper Gun, Grenade Launcher and many more.
>Buy SharpShooters for your support
>20+ different vehicles and helicopters
>Realistic physics
>Beautiful 3D Graphics
>Explosion and Blast effects
